spec_data.Name: PyGreSQL
spec_data.Description:
PostgreSQL is an advanced Object-Relational database management system.
The PyGreSQL package provides a module for developers to use when writing
Python code for accessing a PostgreSQL database.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 16 Aug 2017 12:53:35 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A Python client library for PostgreSQL
